title: Best of The Herd: 05/17/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 05/17/2019
description:
Colin expresses his deepest concerns for the Cleveland Browns after Odell Beckham Jr and Baker Mayfield viciously attach Colin after yesterdays Top 10 most remembered Odell Beckham Moments, The Golden State Warriors are one of the only teams inside the NBA that analytics don't matter too and slow the breaks on calling them a "better" team without Kevin Durant playing in the playoffs. Ben Roethlisberger has just entered Stage four of his NFL career locking completely into this upcoming season by inviting his teammates to his estate and Colin wanders into unfamiliar waters with a scorching earth Golf Take !!!

Guest : Chris Broussard - FS1 Analyst and FOX Sports Radio Host
